function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cost barrier for real-time IEQ measurements","Impact":"Inability to monitor environmental quality in buildings, leading to potential health hazards from contaminants","Mitigation":"Developing less expensive and less intrusive sensors for real-time IEQ measurements","Technologies":"Affordable and robust sensors for measuring contaminants","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Technology developers and building owners"},{"Description":"Privacy risks and security breaches from IoT devices and data collection","Impact":"Potential compromise of building occupants' privacy and security, leading to misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data security measures and ensuring transparent data collection policies","Technologies":"Secure data encryption and privacy-focused IoT devices","People":"Building occupants, researchers, and technology developers","Owner":"Building owners and technology developers"},{"Description":"Capital cost associated with introducing IoT and intelligent furniture in healthy buildings","Impact":"Financial strain on building owners and stakeholders, hindering the implementation of health-enhancing technologies","Mitigation":"Careful cost-benefit analysis and identification of practical investments with high returns","Technologies":"Cost-effective IoT devices and intelligent furniture","People":"Building owners, investors, and stakeholders","Owner":"Building owners and investors"}]}
